SPDX-License-Identifier: BSD-3-Clause-Clear\npragma solidity ^0.8.24;\n\nimport {FHE} from \"@fhevm/solidity/lib/FHE.sol\";\nimport {CoprocessorConfig} from \"@fhevm/solidity/lib/Impl.sol\";\n\n/**\n * @title   ZamaConfig.\n * @notice  This library returns the FHEVM config for different networks\n *          with the contract addresses for (1) ACL, (2) CoprocessorAddress, (3) KMSVerifier,\n *          which are deployed & maintained by Zama.\n */\nlibrary ZamaConfig {\n    /// @notice Returned if the Zama protocol is not supported on the current chain\n    error ZamaProtocolUnsupported();\n\n    function getEthereumCoprocessorConfig() internal view returns (CoprocessorConfig memory config) {\n        if (block.chainid == 1) {\n            config = _getEthereumConfig();\n        } else if (block.chainid == 11155111) {\n            config = _getSepoliaConfig();\n        } else if (block.chainid == 31337) {\n            config = _getLocalConfig();\n        } else {\n            revert ZamaProtocolUnsupported();\n        }\n    }\n\n    function getConfidentialProtocolId() internal view returns (uint256) {\n        if (block.chainid == 1) {\n            return _getEthereumProtocolId();\n        } else if (block.chainid == 11155111) {\n            return _getSepoliaProtocolId();\n        } else if (block.chainid == 31337) {\n            return _getLocalProtocolId();\n        }\n        return 0;\n    }\n\n    /// @dev chainid == 1\n    function _getEthereumProtocolId() private pure returns (uint256) {\n        // Zama Ethereum protocol id is '1'\n        return 1;\n    }\n\n    /// @dev chainid == 1\n    function _getEthereumConfig() private pure returns (CoprocessorConfig memory) {\n        // The addresses below are placeholders and should be replaced with actual addresses\n        // once deployed on the Ethereum mainnet.\n        return\n            CoprocessorConfig({ACLAddress: address(0), CoprocessorAddress: address(0), KMSVerifierAddress: address(0)});\n    }\n\n    /// @dev chainid == 11155111\n    function _getSepoliaProtocolId() private pure returns (uint256) {\n        // Zama Ethereum Sepolia protocol id is '10000 + Zama Ethereum protocol id'\n        return 10001;\n    }\n\n    /// @dev chainid == 11155111\n    function _getSepoliaConfig() private pure returns (CoprocessorConfig memory) {\n        return\n            CoprocessorConfig({\n                ACLAddress: 0xf0Ffdc93b7E186bC2f8CB3dAA75D86d1930A433D,\n                CoprocessorAddress: 0x92C920834Ec8941d2C77D188936E1f7A6f49c127,\n                KMSVerifierAddress: 0xbE0E383937d564D7FF0BC3b46c51f0bF8d5C311A\n            });\n    }\n\n    /// @dev chainid == 31337\n    function _getLocalProtocolId() private pure returns (uint256) {\n        return type(uint256).max;\n    }\n\n    function _getLocalConfig() private pure returns (CoprocessorConfig memory) {\n        return\n            CoprocessorConfig({\n                ACLAddress: 0xf0Ffdc93b7E186bC2f8CB3dAA75D86d1930A433D,\n                CoprocessorAddress: 0x92C920834Ec8941d2C77D188936E1f7A6f49c127,\n                KMSVerifierAddress: 0xbE0E383937d564D7FF0BC3b46c51f0bF8d5C311A\n            });\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * @title   ZamaEthereumConfig.\n * @dev     This contract can be inherited by a contract wishing to use the FHEVM contracts provided by Zama\n *          on the Ethereum (mainnet) network (chainId = 1) or Sepolia (testnet) network (chainId = 11155111).\n *          Other providers may offer similar contracts deployed at different addresses.\n *          If you wish to use them, you should rely on the instructions from these providers.\n */\nabstract contract ZamaEthereumConfig {\n    constructor() {\n        FHE.setCoprocessor(ZamaConfig.getEthereumCoprocessorConfig());\n    }\n\n    function confidentialProtocolId() public view returns (uint256) {\n        return ZamaConfig.getConfidentialProtocolId();\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0xa6e5421fb2a631825a980896055598620b5959bd1f5222031d95515fc1eb2a99","license":"BSD-3-Clause-Clear"},"@fhevm/solidity/lib/FHE.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: // Payer (token holder)\n        address payee; // Recipient\n        uint256 maxClearAmount; // Optional: maximum clear amount (e.g., quoted price). Use 0 if sensitive.\n        bytes32 resourceHash; // Resource/order identifier\n        uint48 validAfter; // Start of validity window (unix seconds)\n        uint48 validBefore; // Expiration time (unix seconds)\n        bytes32 nonce; // Replay-protection nonce\n        bytes32 encryptedAmountHash; // Hash of the encrypted amount handle\n    }\n\n    bytes32 public constant CONFIDENTIAL_PAYMENT_TYPEHASH =\n        keccak256(\n            \"ConfidentialPayment(\"\n            \"address holder,\"\n            \"address payee,\"\n            \"uint256 maxClearAmount,\"\n            \"bytes32 resourceHash,\"\n            \"uint48 validAfter,\"\n            \"uint48 validBefore,\"\n            \"bytes32 nonce,\"\n            \"bytes32 encryptedAmountHash\"\n            \")\"\n        );\n\n    /// @dev Replay protection: each (holder, nonce) pair can be used only once\n    mapping(address => mapping(bytes32 => bool)) public usedNonces;\n\n    /// @dev Payment execution event (only emits the euint64 handle, not the plaintext amount)\n    event ConfidentialPaymentExecuted(\n        address indexed holder,\n        address indexed payee,\n        uint256 maxClearAmount,\n        bytes32 indexed resourceHash,\n        bytes32 nonce,\n        euint64 transferredAmount\n    );\n\n    constructor(\n        string memory name_,\n        string memory symbol_,\n        string memory tokenURI_,\n        IERC20 underlying_\n    )\n        ERC7984(name_, symbol_, tokenURI_)\n        ERC7984ERC20Wrapper(underlying_)\n        // EIP712 name/version; use the same name as the token\n        EIP712(name_, \"1\")\n    {}\n\n    // ====== EIP-712 hash helpers ======\n\n    function _hashPayment(ConfidentialPayment calldata p) internal pure returns (bytes32) {\n        return\n            keccak256(\n                abi.encode(\n                    CONFIDENTIAL_PAYMENT_TYPEHASH,\n                    p.holder,\n                    p.payee,\n                    p.maxClearAmount,\n                    p.resourceHash,\n                    p.validAfter,\n                    p.validBefore,\n                    p.nonce,\n                    p.encryptedAmountHash\n                )\n            );\n    }\n\n    function _useNonce(address holder, bytes32 nonce) internal {\n        if (usedNonces[holder][nonce]) {\n            revert(\"X402: nonce already used\");\n        }\n        usedNonces[holder][nonce] = true;\n    }\n\n    // ====== External: EIP-712 authorization + confidential transfer ======\n\n    /// @notice Execute a confidential payment using the holder\u2019s EIP-712 signature\n    /// @param p Payment authorization struct (typed data)\n    /// @param encryptedAmountInput externalEuint64 handle generated by the fhEVM SDK\n    /// @param inputProof           fhEVM input proof\n    /// @param sig                  Holder\u2019s EIP-712 signature over the typed data\n    ///\n    /// @dev Flow:\n    ///  1. Validate time window and nonce\n    ///  2. Ensure encryptedAmountInput matches p.encryptedAmountHash\n    ///  3. Recover signer via EIP-712 and require signer == p.holder\n    ///  4. confidentialTransferWithAuthorization(\n        ConfidentialPayment calldata p,\n        externalEuint64 encryptedAmountInput,\n        bytes calldata inputProof,\n        bytes calldata sig\n    ) external returns (euint64 transferred) {\n        // --- Basic checks ---\n\n        require(p.holder != address(0), \"X402: invalid holder\");\n        require(p.payee != address(0), \"X402: invalid payee\");\n\n        // Validity window\n        uint48 blockTs = uint48(block.timestamp);\n        require(blockTs >= p.validAfter, \"X402: not yet valid\");\n        require(blockTs <= p.validBefore, \"X402: authorization expired\");\n\n        // Nonce replay protection\n        _useNonce(p.holder, p.nonce);\n\n        // Bind the encrypted amount handle to prevent ciphertext substitution\n        require(keccak256(abi.encode(encryptedAmountInput)) == p.encryptedAmountHash, \"X402: encryptedAmount mismatch\");\n\n        // --- Recover signature ---\n\n        bytes32 digest = _hashTypedDataV4(_hashPayment(p));\n        require(ECDSA.recover(digest, sig) == p.holder, \"X402: invalid signature\");\n\n        // --- Confidential transfer ---\n\n        // Convert externalEuint64 + inputProof into a usable euint64.\n        // Note: FHE.fromExternal authorizes this ciphertext to the current contract in the fhEVM ACL.\n        // Use ERC7984 internal _transfer to move confidential balance from holder to payee.\n        // _transfer does not enforce EOA/operator checks; this contract guards via signatures.\n        transferred = _transfer(p.holder, p.payee, FHE.fromExternal(encryptedAmountInput, inputProof));\n\n        emit ConfidentialPaymentExecuted(p.holder, p.payee, p.maxClearAmount, p.resourceHash, p.nonce, transferred);\n    }\n\n    function decimals() public view override(ERC7984, ERC7984ERC20Wrapper) returns (uint8) {\n        return ERC7984ERC20Wrapper.decimals();\n    }\n\n    function _update(\n        address from,\n        address to,\n        euint64 amount\n    ) internal override(ERC7984, ERC7984ObserverAccess) returns (euint64 transferred) {\n        return ERC7984ObserverAccess._update(from, to, amount);\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0xc0922c4f1e297cf5676d2a7d9f1ad5930c3ec5392039b829a887fc0e12f3f97b","license":"BSD-3-Clause-Clear"},"encrypted-types/EncryptedTypes.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: ECDSAInvalidSignatureLength(uint256).details: The signature has an invalid length.

ECDSAInvalidSignatureS(bytes32).details: The signature has an S value that is in the upper half order.

ERC7984InvalidGatewayRequest(uint256).details: The given gateway request ID `requestId` is invalid.

ERC7984InvalidReceiver(address).details: The given receiver `receiver` is invalid for transfers.

ERC7984InvalidSender(address).details: The given sender `sender` is invalid for transfers.

ERC7984UnauthorizedCaller(address).details: The given caller `caller` is not authorized for the current operation.

ERC7984UnauthorizedSpender(address,addre.details: The given holder `holder` is not authorized to spend on behalf of `spender`.

ERC7984UnauthorizedUseOfEncryptedAmount(.details: The caller `user` does not have access to the encrypted amount `amount`. NOTE: Try using the equivalent transfer function with an input proof.

ERC7984ZeroBalance(address).details: The holder `holder` is trying to send tokens but has a balance of 0.

SafeCastOverflowedUintDowncast(uint8,uin.details: Value doesn't fit in an uint of `bits` size.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

Unauthorized().details: Thrown when an account tries to set a `newObserver` for a given `account` without proper authority.

AmountDiscloseRequested(bytes32,address).details: Emitted when an encrypted amount `encryptedAmount` is requested for disclosure by `requester`.

AmountDisclosed(bytes32,uint64).details: Emitted when an encrypted amount is disclosed. Accounts with access to the encrypted amount `encryptedAmount` that is also accessible to this contract should be able to disclose the amount. This functionality is implementation specific.

ConfidentialPaymentExecuted(address,addr.details: Payment execution event (only emits the euint64 handle, not the plaintext amount)

ConfidentialTransfer(address,address,byt.details: Emitted when a confidential transfer is made from `from` to `to` of encrypted amount `amount`.

EIP712DomainChanged().details: MAY be emitted to signal that the domain could have changed.

ERC7984ObserverAccessObserverSet(address.details: Emitted when the observer is changed for the given account `account`.

OperatorSet(address,address,uint48).details: Emitted when the expiration timestamp for an operator `operator` is updated for a given `holder`. The operator may move any amount of tokens on behalf of the holder until the timestamp `until`.

confidentialBalanceOf(address).details: Returns the confidential balance of the account `account`.

confidentialTotalSupply().details: Returns the confidential total supply of the token.

confidentialTransfer(address,bytes32).details: Similar to {confidentialTransfer-address-externalEuint64-bytes} but without an input proof. The caller *must* already be allowed by ACL for the given `amount`.

confidentialTransfer(address,bytes32,byt.details: Transfers the encrypted amount `encryptedAmount` to `to` with the given input proof `inputProof`. Returns the encrypted amount that was actually transferred.

confidentialTransferAndCall(address,byte.details: Similar to {confidentialTransfer-address-euint64} but with a callback to `to` after the transfer.

Similar to {confidentialTransfer-address-externalEuint64-bytes} but with a callback to `to` after the transfer. The callback is made to the {IERC7984Receiver-onConfidentialTransferReceived} function on the to address with the actual transferred amount (may differ from the given `encryptedAmount`) and the given data `data`.

confidentialTransferFrom(address,address.details: Similar to {confidentialTransferFrom-address-address-externalEuint64-bytes} but without an input proof. The caller *must* be already allowed by ACL for the given `amount`.

Transfers the encrypted amount `encryptedAmount` from `from` to `to` with the given input proof `inputProof`. `msg.sender` must be either `from` or an operator for `from`. Returns the encrypted amount that was actually transferred.

confidentialTransferFromAndCall(address,.details: Similar to {confidentialTransferFrom-address-address-euint64} but with a callback to `to` after the transfer.
Similar to {confidentialTransferFrom-address-address-externalEuint64-bytes} but with a callback to `to` after the transfer.

confidentialTransferWithAuthorization((a.details: Flow:  1. Validate time window and nonce  2. Ensure encryptedAmountInput matches p.encryptedAmountHash  3. Recover signer via EIP-712 and require signer == p.holder  4. Convert to euint64 via FHE.fromExternal(...)  5. Use ERC7984 internal _transfer to move confidential balance from holder to payee

params.encryptedAmountInput: externalEuint64 handle generated by the fhEVM SDK
params.sig: Holders EIP-712 signature over the typed data

returns.transferred: Encrypted amount handle that was transferred

contractURI().details: Returns the contract URI. See https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7572[ERC-7572] for details.

discloseEncryptedAmount(bytes32,uint64,b.details: Publicly discloses an encrypted value with a given decryption proof. Emits the {AmountDisclosed} event. NOTE: May not be tied to a prior request via {requestDiscloseEncryptedAmount}.

eip712Domain().details: returns the fields and values that describe the domain separator used by this contract for EIP-712 signature.

finalizeUnwrap(bytes32,uint64,bytes).details: Fills an unwrap request for a given cipher-text `burntAmount` with the `cleartextAmount` and `decryptionProof`.

isOperator(address,address).details: Returns true if `spender` is currently an operator for `holder`.

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

observer(address).details: Returns the observer for the given account `account`.

onTransferReceived(address,address,uint2.details: `ERC1363` callback function which wraps tokens to the address specified in `data` or the address `from` (if no address is specified in `data`). This function refunds any excess tokens sent beyond the nearest multiple of {rate}. See {wrap} from more details on wrapping tokens.

rate().details: Returns the rate at which the underlying token is converted to the wrapped token. For example, if the `rate` is 1000, then 1000 units of the underlying token equal 1 unit of the wrapped token.

requestDiscloseEncryptedAmount(bytes32).details: Starts the process to disclose an encrypted amount `encryptedAmount` publicly by making it publicly decryptable. Emits the {AmountDiscloseRequested} event. NOTE: Both `msg.sender` and `address(this)` must have permission to access the encrypted amount `encryptedAmount` to request disclosure of the encrypted amount `encryptedAmount`.

setObserver(address,address).details: Sets the observer for the given account `account` to `newObserver`. Can be called by the account or the existing observer to abdicate the observer role (may only set to `address(0)`).

setOperator(address,uint48).details: Sets `operator` as an operator for `holder` until the timestamp `until`. NOTE: An operator may transfer any amount of tokens on behalf of a holder while approved.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token.

underlying().details: Returns the address of the underlying ERC-20 token that is being wrapped.

unwrap(address,address,bytes32).details: Unwraps tokens from `from` and sends the underlying tokens to `to`. The caller must be `from` or be an approved operator for `from`. `amount * rate()` underlying tokens are sent to `to`. NOTE: The unwrap request created by this function must be finalized by calling {finalizeUnwrap}. NOTE: The caller *must* already be approved by ACL for the given `amount`.

unwrap(address,address,bytes32,bytes).details: Variant of {unwrap} that passes an `inputProof` which approves the caller for the `encryptedAmount` in the ACL.

wrap(address,uint256).details: Wraps amount `amount` of the underlying token into a confidential token and sends it to `to`. Tokens are exchanged at a fixed rate specified by {rate} such that `amount / rate()` confidential tokens are sent. Amount transferred in is rounded down to the nearest multiple of {rate}.

usedNonces.details: Replay protection: each (holder, nonce) pair can be used only once

InvalidKMSSignatures().notice: Returned if the returned KMS signatures are not valid.

ZamaProtocolUnsupported().notice: Returned if the Zama protocol is not supported on the current chain

PublicDecryptionVerified(bytes32[],bytes.notice: This event is emitted when public decryption has been successfully verified.

confidentialTransferWithAuthorization((a.notice: Execute a confidential payment using the holders EIP-712 signature
